dublin_core.dcvalue: Telehealth offers many opportunities to provide evidence based cost effective home care practice To ensure success administrators managers and clinicians must identify their agency s telehealth goals and compare these with technology manufacturers recommendations This article provides a list of considerations agencies can use to evaluate telehealth programs objectively Successful telehealth applications are also presented
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:33:15Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2004-10-15
Matching telehealth applications to the patient, clinician, and agency's needs.
